availableProgramScreen.description:
注册清洁能源生态系统，让您的家庭或小型企业加入Olivine能源计划。您的参与将支持整个加州的电网恢复力和空气清洁，有助于避免使用污染气体的火电厂。

注册裨益

了解您的能源使用情况以及您的节能行动产生的影响。Olivine还将帮助您找到并获得您有资格获得的奖励或折扣。

参与福利

无论您住在加州哪个地方，呼吸洁净的空气是每一个人的权利。在用电需求高或碳排放严重时，我们会寄发通知邀请您参与节能活动。您参与这些活动将有助于节约能源，降低您的账单金额，并且为所有加州市民支持洁净的空气。您将可通过我们的应用追踪您的参与对能源与环境产生的影响。参与这些节能活动完全是自愿行为。

您的行动将有助于支持地方政府、慈善机构和非营利组织从事对抗气候变化、提倡洁净空气的工作，并能帮助低收入居民。Olivine会在您参与后捐款给洁净空气联盟：www.ccair.org

免费参加，不必承担任何义务。立即注册，发挥您的影响力。 每户限一人注册。

Olivine能源计划是一项Olivine社区计划™

availableProgramScreen.description:
Join your community and get paid to save electricity in your home. This program is available to residents of all South-Central Fresno who live in these zip codes:

93701, 93702, 93703, 93704, 93706, 93721, 93725, and 93728.

You get paid for your participation in Energy Events and in surveys. This program is free and there is no commitment.

Energy Events (Up to $50)

Take simple actions to save energy.

Customer Experience Survey ($30)

Provide feedback on your participation experience.

Rewards and enrollment are limited to one person per household.

The Fresno Energy Program is an Olivine ClimateResponse™ Program™.

verificationScreen.description: You may be an SCP customer. Please enter the information below to verify your status and enroll in the GridSavvy program. You can find this information on your electricity bill. If you don’t know your PG&E account number, please call 1 (800) 743-5000 for assistance.
verificationScreen.accountNumber: Why do you need my PG&E account number?

modalAccountNumber.title: Attention:
modalAccountNumber.description: Sonoma Clean Power and PG&E work in partnership to bring you electricity. As an SCP customer, SCP procures the power sources for the energy you use in your home or business, while PG&E manages billing and the maintenance of the poles and wires that get that electricity to you. Thanks to public power programs like SCP, customers now have a choice to receive a cleaner mix of energy sources and keep more money in our local community.

notVerifiedScreen.description: You cannot be verified as a SCP customer. If you believe this is in error, please call 800-743-5000 so we can help you complete enrollment.

availableProgramScreen.description:
Thank you for your interest in joining Sonoma Clean Power’s GridSavvy Community. Your participation allows Sonoma Clean Power to power more Sonoma and Mendocino county homes with clean, renewable energy while making energy savings easy for you. This may seem small, but together we can turn the tide on the climate crisis.

Participation Benefits

In times of high stress on the electricity grid, you will be asked to adjust your energy usage for a period of time, usually one to two hours. You will earn $1 for every GridSavvy Community event that you choose to participate in. Once per calendar quarter, you will have the opportunity to cash out your rewards or donate your balance to one of our local charity partners.

Participation is free and completely voluntary. Sign up today and start earning!

recentEnergyHistory.title: 近期能耗记录
recentEnergyHistory.noData: 您的仪表数据可能需要几天时间才能出现在应用程序中。请定期查看。

modalEnergyHistory.title: 能源记录
modalEnergyHistory.description:
什么是千瓦时
千瓦时（千瓦时或1000瓦时）是电量消耗的量度，等于一小时使用某一1,000瓦的电器消耗的电力。

什么是常规的一天?
常规的一天，如“常规周五”，是指您通常在一周中的这一天消耗的电量。

为什么看不到最近两天的使用数据?
电力公司大约需要2天才能提供电表数据，因此您最近一次“本周”数据通常不包含过去2天的数据。有时还可能缺少其他一些天的数据。别担心，电力公司会在稍后提供这些数据。

什么是上周/最高和最低值?
上周/最高值是前一周中消电量最多的一天。红条表示当天的用电量。同样，“上周/最低值”指前一周消耗电量最少的一天。绿条表示当天的用电量。

modalReward.title: 与计划中的其他人员相比，您的成就水平反映了您在能源活动中的参与度。

gridEmissionsContainer.Cont_DataCont_Description_Text: Higher numbers indicate the grid has limited clean energy resources and increased emissions. Reduce electricity use when this number is high.

modalEnvironmentalImpact.title: 环境影响
modalEnvironmentalImpact.description:
您是否知道您使用能源的行为会直接影响空气质量？

环境影响栏显示您通过能源活动产生的影响以及该计划所有参与者的影响。 每当您在能源活动中减少能源使用量，您节省的能源就会添加到“环境影响“仪表板上显示的数字。

“能源影响” 是您通过参加活动而减少的用电量。根据这一数字，我们计算出 “减排量”，即您减少用电所避免的总二氧化碳磅数。 “汽车行驶里程等量”是指将您在节能活动中减少的二氧化碳排放量等同于以汽油为动力的汽车行驶的英里数。

aboutScreen.title: 关于
aboutScreen.description: Olivine的核心服务利用屡获殊荣的Olivine DER平台，该平台是旨在降低成本和最大化DER价值的全面分布式能源管理平台。
